result.reason: Allows users to search text within terminal sessions (SSH/Telnet), requiring a move from embedded PuTTY to a native terminal control or complex screen scraping.
result.approach: Evaluate replacing the embedded PuTTY window with a native SSH client implementation (e.g., using SSH.NET and a terminal control) to provide access to the text buffer for search functionality.
